page.title: 13FASHION
page.content: Everyone wears something different. White coats,baggy trousers,skin tight and threequarters length trousers,mesh T_shirts,T_shirts with big print and batwing jumpers are all popular now. Leather{boots,granny boots}and slip on{shoes}are fashionable.Girls' shoes are normally pointed. Women generally wear{lipstick, {eyeshadow, blusher}and{mascara.}They normally wear it if they are going out but some wear it every day. { Nail varnish}can be any colour.Blue, red,green,yellow,silver,etc. People have{hair}flicked or layered, spiked or streaked.It is usually worn short or medium length. Out of 100 children 42 bite their nails,59 grow their nails and 24 put on nail varnish.A quarter of girls have{pierced ears,}but only a few boys do.
